thread.title: BRIEF-Workiva Q4 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.34

title: BRIEF-Workiva Q4 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.34
text: 27 PM / Updated 6 minutes ago BRIEF-Workiva Q4 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.34 Reuters Staff Feb 22 (Reuters) - Workiva Inc: * WORKIVA ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q4 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.19 * Q4 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.34 * SEES FY 2018 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.77 TO $0.82 * SEES Q1 2018 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.19 TO $0.20 * SEES FY 2018 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $1.35 TO $1.40 * SEES Q1 2018 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.33 TO $0.34 * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $234 MILLION TO $236 MILLION * SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE $57.3 MILLION TO $57.8 MILLION * Q4 REVENUE $54.5 MILLION VERSUS $46.4 MILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.22, REVENUE VIEW $53.2 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * FY2018 REVENUE VIEW $235.4 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * Q1 REVENUE VIEW $59.1 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
